title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: When modifying the default value of a report parameter, the previously set default value in the list box is lost.
EB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter should remain unchanged even after modifying the default value.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Set a default value for the list box.
3. Modify the default value.
4. Check if the default value in the list box is retained.
